sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"吸引，引诱"之意。
means: attract ：普通用词，指客观上吸引人的注意力。
charm ：侧重迷住某人或使之高兴。
enchant ：着重指有能力引起被迷住者的欢乐或赞美。
fascinate ：通常含使人无法拒绝、无法摆脱的意味。
tempt ：指吸引力很强，强调欲望被唤醒。

sentence.Network_en: Can I tempt you with a little puff pastry?
sentence.Network_cn: 我能给你尝点泡芙点心吗？

sentence.Network_en: Don't let credit tempt you to buy something you can't afford.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要因为可以赊购，就买超过自己支付能力的东西。

sentence.Network_en: The woman used all her wiles to tempt him into following her.
sentence.Network_cn: 那女人用尽了自己的诱骗本领勾引着他尾随而去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... anyway ad. 究竟；无论如何 tempt vt. 引诱 system n. 体制；制度.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●silverware n. 银器 ●tempt v. 吸引，引诱 ●bargain v. 讨价还价.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... tempestuous a 暴风雨般的；剧烈的 tempt v 诱惑，尝试 attenmpt v 尝试，企图.
大学英语四级词汇表 ... temporary a. 暂时的，临时的 tempt vt. 引诱，诱惑；吸引 temptation n. 诱惑，引诱.

list.abs: I am certainly tempted , sir ., 我当然动心 , 先生.
走遍美国-----必须掌握的词汇 - 豆丁网 ... suite 套房 17. tempting 诱人的 18. uncomfortable 不舒服的 19.
英语中有哪些形容词20个_百度知道 ... superficial 表面现象的 tempting 吸引人的 traditional 传统的.
"fate"怎么说合适-翻译"fate"-可可查词 ... Fate Symphony 命运交响曲; tempt fate 蔑视命运; 冒险; Blue Fate 蓝色生命.
心理学专业英语词汇(T1) ... tempt 引诱 tempt fate 蔑视命运 temptable 可诱惑的.

jx.jx_en_mean: do something that is risky or dangerous

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French tempter 'to test', from Latin temptare 'handle, test, try'

entry.def: Something that tempts you attracts you and makes you want it, even though it may be wrong or harmful.

example.ex: Reducing the income will further impoverish these families and could tempt an offender into further crime...
example.tran: 降低收入只会使这些家庭更加贫穷，而且可能诱使不法分子进一步犯罪。

example.ex: It is the fresh fruit that tempts me at this time of year...
example.tran: 一年当中这个时节，新鲜水果最能吸引我了。

entry.def: If you tempt someone, you offer them something they want in order to encourage them to do what you want them to do.

example.ex: ...a million dollar marketing campaign to tempt American tourists back to Britain...
example.tran: 耗资百万美元试图把美国游客重新吸引到英国来的营销活动

example.ex: Having spent so long at a great club like Rangers, no other Scottish team could tempt him away...
example.tran: 在流浪者队这样优秀的俱乐部呆了这么久之后，其他苏格兰球队都吸引不了他了。

entry.tran: 说晦气话，玩过火，冒险（使好运结束）
entry.def: If someone says that something they say or do is tempting fate or is tempting providence, they mean they are worried that it may cause the good luck they have had so far to end.

example.ex: As soon as you start to talk about never having played on a losing side, it is tempting fate.
example.tran: 你刚说从来没输过，晦气就来了。

means.word_mean: 1. dispose or incline or entice to;

sentences.sentence: "We were tempted by the delicious-looking food"

means.word_mean: 2. provoke someone to do something through (often false or exaggerated) promises or persuasion;
3. give rise to a desire by being attractive or inviting;
4. induce into action by using one's charm;

sentences.sentence: "She charmed him into giving her all his money"
"St. Anthony was tempted in the desert"

auth_sentence.content: All sorts of...delicacies to tempt Gwennie's finicky appetite.
auth_sentence.res_content: All sorts of...delicacies to tempt Gwennie's finicky appetite.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: All sorts of...delicacies to tempt Gwennie's finicky appetite.

auth_sentence.content: Nor tempt the wrath of Heav'ns avenging Sire.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor tempt the wrath of Heav'ns avenging Sire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor tempt the wrath of Heav'ns avenging Sire.

auth_sentence.content: Tempt not yet the brushes of the war.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tempt not yet the brushes of the war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tempt not yet the brushes of the war.

stems_affixes.word_buile: contempt[n.轻视,藐视;受辱,丢脸]+ible..的→adj.令人轻视的
contempt[n.轻视,藐视;受辱,丢脸]+uous……的→adj.表示轻蔑的,藐视的
tempt[v.诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣]+atious→adj.诱惑性的
at一再+tempt尝试→一再尝试→企图
con共同+tempt尝试→大家都能试下→没什么了不起→轻视,藐视
tempt[v.诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣]+ation表名词→n.引诱,诱惑;诱惑物
at一再+tempt尝试→一再尝试→企图
con共同+temn=tempt尝试→大家都能试下→没什么了不起→蔑视

stems_affixes.value_cn: 诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣
stems_affixes.word_buile: tempt尝试→v.诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣

Sentence.sentence: It is tempting to declare the Swedish policies regressive(退步的)and hail the American system as superior.

means.word_mean: 引诱或怂恿(某人)干不正当的事

sentences.en: His friend tempted him to steal.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友怂恿他去偷东西。

jushi.english: Your offer doesn't tempt me at all.
jushi.chinese: 你的建议一点也打动不了我的心。

jushi.english: The football club tried to tempt the player with offers of money.
jushi.chinese: 该足球俱乐部试图用金钱收买这个球员。

jushi.english: Nothing could tempt my husband to change his mind.
jushi.chinese: 什么也不能诱使我丈夫改变主意。
